# AIG
AIG is a collection of Automatic Item Generators. Currently, only the linear syllogism and arithmetic generators are in the package. More is to follow soon!
```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "README-"
)
```
- AIG
    - `lisy`
    - `arith`
  
## Installation
`AIG` is in [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/), but you can use [devtools](https://cran.r-project.org/package=devtools) to install the latest and greatest version.
To do so:

```{r Installation, eval=FALSE}
if(!require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Aidenloe/AIG")
```
